column5: Hey Folks, I'm looking for ice fishing hut rentals around the GTA, simcoe obviously comes to mind first, but am open to anything.  Can anyone give me a recomendation (both overnight or just the day)  and share some expreinces with me? CHeers, -Graeme  P.S. if you don't want to be seen as advertising, just PM me.

I've used Simcoe Fishing Adventures a few times, and I'll be out with them again this Sunday.  http://simcoefishingadventures.com/  They run a pretty good operation. I'm sure o few of the OFNers can vouch.  Good luck!
